column4: why does this error come up and how can I resolve it: dpkg: warning: parsing file '/var/lib/dpkg/status' near line 29887 package 'handbrake-cli': error in Version string 'svn3917ppa1~lucid1': version number does not start with digit
i think that was a bug

wacomalt, i don't ply with opencl before, but if you need headers and related thing to included needed files, you should install opencl-dev packages ... Thats way debian/ubuntu naming development packages
that 'bug' has been popping up over the last few months. How can I clean it up for when i use dpkg
